item.title: Converting to TypeScript with React Native in 5 minutes
item.description: Enabling typescript on a React Native codebase.

item.title: Create and showcase your own React UI library using Webpack 4
item.description: When working in a company with multiple projects, you might want to have design guidelines to ensure consistency throughout. What if you could have a showcase for your styled components and still be able to use those components in other projects, with something as easy as a installing a npm package?
